vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to and the renewal of Specific Use Permit No. 2078 for an industrial (outside) potentially incompatible use limited to concrete and asphalt crushing on property zoned an IM Industrial Manufacturing District on the east line of Luna Road, north of Ryan Road
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to a revised site plan and revised conditions
Z189-263(PD)
